WITH age_group_buy AS ( SELECT COUNT(c.customer_age) AS 'TOTAL_AGE', COUNT(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN 1 END) AS 'TEN', COUNT(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN 1 END) AS 'TWENTY', COUNT(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN 1 END) AS 'THIRTY', COUNT(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN 1 END) AS 'FORTY', COUNT(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN 1 END) AS 'FIFTY', COUNT(CASE WHEN c.customer_age >= 60 THEN 1 END) AS 'SIXTYUP' FROM order_info o JOIN customer c ON o.customer_code = c.customer_code WHERE o.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) SELECT ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, sixtyup, total_age, ROUND(ten / total_age, 3) * 100 AS 'ten_radio', ROUND(twenty / total_age, 3) * 100 AS 'twenty_radio', ROUND(thirty / total_age, 3) * 100 AS 'forty_radio', ROUND(forty / total_age, 3) * 100 AS 'fifty_radio', ROUND(sixtyup / total_age, 3) * 100 AS 'sixtyup_radio' FROM age_group_buy

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT goods_name FROM goods WHERE goods_code = T.goods_code), '합계') AS goods_name, total_buy_count FROM ( SELECT oi.goods_code AS goods_code, SUM(oi.order_count) AS total_buy_count FROM order_info oi JOIN goods g ON oi.goods_code = g.goods_code JOIN brand b ON g.brand_code = b.brand_code JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code WHERE b.brand_code = #{brandCode} AND c.customer_age BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge} AND oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY oi.goods_code WITH ROLLUP ) AS T ORDER BY IF(goods_code = 'Total', 1, 0), total_buy_count DESC

WITH grade_group_radio AS ( SELECT count(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'GOLD' THEN 1 END) AS gold, count(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'BLACK' THEN 1 END) AS black, count(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'GREEN' THEN 1 END) AS green, count(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'PINK' THEN 1 END) AS pink, count(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'BABY' THEN 1 END) AS baby, count(*) AS total_customer FROM order_info oi JOIN customer c ON (oi.customer_code = c.customer_code) WHERE oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) SELECT gold, black, green, pink, baby, ROUND(gold * 100.0 / total_customer, 3) AS 'gold_radio', ROUND(black * 100.0 / total_customer, 3) AS 'black_radio', ROUND(green * 100.0 / total_customer, 3) AS 'green_radio', ROUND(pink * 100.0 / total_customer, 3) AS 'pink_radio', ROUND(baby * 100.0 / total_customer, 3) AS 'baby_radio' FROM grade_group_radio;

SELECT g.brand_code, b.brand_name, count(*) AS order_count FROM order_info oi JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code JOIN goods g ON oi.goods_code = g.goods_code JOIN brand b ON g.brand_code = b.brand_code WHERE c.customer_grade = #{grade} AND oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY brand_code ORDER BY order_count DESC;

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT goods_name FROM goods WHERE goods_code = T.goods_code), '합계') AS goods_name, total_buy_count FROM ( SELECT oi.goods_code AS goods_code, SUM(oi.order_count) AS total_buy_count FROM order_info oi JOIN goods g ON oi.goods_code = g.goods_code JOIN brand b ON g.brand_code = b.brand_code JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code WHERE b.brand_code = #{brandCode} AND c.customer_grade = #{grade} AND oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY oi.goods_code WITH ROLLUP ) AS T ORDER BY IF(goods_code = 'Total', 1, 0), total_buy_count DESC;

WITH age_group_sales AS ( SELECT SUM(oi.order_price) AS 'total_sales', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'ten_sales', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'twenty_sales', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'thirty_sales', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'forty_sales', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_age BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'fifty_sales', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_age >= 60 THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'sixty_sales' FROM order_info oi JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code WHERE oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) SELECT total_sales, ten_sales, twenty_sales, thirty_sales, forty_sales, fifty_sales, sixty_sales, ROUND(ten_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'ten_sales_radio', ROUND(twenty_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'twenty_sales_radio', ROUND(thirty_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'thirty_sales_radio', ROUND(forty_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'forty_sales_radio', ROUND(fifty_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'fifty_sales_radio', ROUND(sixty_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'sixty_sales_radio' FROM age_group_sales;

SELECT g.brand_code, b.brand_name, SUM(oi.order_price) AS total_order_price FROM order_info oi JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code JOIN goods g ON oi.goods_code = g.goods_code JOIN brand b ON g.brand_code = b.brand_code WHERE c.customer_age BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge} AND oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY brand_code ORDER BY total_order_price DESC;

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT goods_name FROM goods WHERE goods_code = T.goods_code), '합계') AS goods_name, total_buy_price FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(oi.goods_code, 'Total') AS goods_code, SUM(oi.order_price) AS total_buy_price FROM order_info oi JOIN goods g ON oi.goods_code = g.goods_code JOIN brand b ON g.brand_code = b.brand_code JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code WHERE b.brand_code = #{brandCode} -- 브랜드 들어보는 게 다르게 하면 됨. AND c.customer_age BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge} GROUP BY oi.goods_code WITH ROLLUP ) AS T ORDER BY IF(goods_code = 'Total', 1, 0), total_buy_price DESC

WITH grade_group_sales AS ( SELECT SUM(oi.order_price) AS 'TOTAL_SALES', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'GOLD' THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'GOLD_SALES', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'BLACK' THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'BLACK_SALES', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'GREEN' THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'GREEN_SALES', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'PINK' THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'PINK_SALES', SUM(CASE WHEN c.customer_grade = 'BABY' THEN oi.order_price END) AS 'BABY_SALES' FROM order_info oi JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code WHERE oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) SELECT total_sales, gold_sales, black_sales, green_sales, pink_sales, baby_sales, ROUND(gold_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'gold_sales_radio', ROUND(black_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'black_sales_radio', ROUND(green_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'green_sales_radio', ROUND(pink_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'pink_sales_radio', ROUND(baby_sales / total_sales, 3) * 100 AS 'baby_sales_radio' FROM grade_group_sales

SELECT g.brand_code, b.brand_name, SUM(oi.order_price) AS total_order_price FROM order_info oi JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code JOIN goods g ON oi.goods_code = g.goods_code JOIN brand b ON g.brand_code = b.brand_code WHERE c.customer_grade = #{brandCode} AND oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY brand_code ORDER BY total_order_price DESC;

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT goods_name FROM goods WHERE goods_code = T.goods_code), '합계') AS goods_name, total_buy_price FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(oi.goods_code, 'Total') AS goods_code, SUM(oi.order_price) AS total_buy_price FROM order_info oi JOIN goods g ON oi.goods_code = g.goods_code JOIN brand b ON g.brand_code = b.brand_code JOIN customer c ON oi.customer_code = c.customer_code WHERE b.brand_code = #{brandCode} AND c.customer_grade = #{gradeCode} AND oi.order_created_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY oi.goods_code WITH ROLLUP ) AS T ORDER BY IF(goods_code = 'Total', 1, 0), total_buy_price DESC
